content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <feed xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom">  <title>INSPIRE Geoportal Discovery / Viewer: What's new</title>  <link href="http://inspire-geoportal.ec.europa.eu/discovery/changes.xml" rel="self"/>  <link href="http://inspire-geoportal.ec.europa.eu/changes.xml" rel="related"/>  <link href="http://inspire-geoportal.ec.europa.eu/editor/changes.xml" rel="related"/>  <link href="http://inspire-geoportal.ec.europa.eu/validator2/changes.xml" rel="related"/>  <link href="http://inspire-geoportal.ec.europa.eu/roadmap/changes.xml" rel="related"/>  <logo>http://inspire-geoportal.ec.europa.eu/images/logo-ec.jpg</logo>  <id>http://inspire-geoportal.ec.europa.eu/discovery/changes.xml</id>  <updated>2012-12-04T00:00:00+02:00</updated>  <author>   <name>European Commission, Joint Research Centre</name>   <email>inspire-geoportal@jrc.ec.europa.eu</email>   <uri>http://ec.europa.eu/dgs/jrc/</uri>  </author>  <generator uri="http://www.redmine.org/">Redmine</generator>  <entry>   <title>Bug #2024: Discovery: resource types selected by default must be dataset and series</title>   <id>http://vap-sdisvn.jrc.it/redmine/issues/show/2024</id>   <updated>2013-07-15T16:41:55+02:00</updated>   <content type="html"> <p>The fix for bug <a href="http://vap-sdisvn.jrc.it/redmine/issues/show/2014" class="issue" title="Discovery: download service datasets among results even when only layers are selected (Resolved)">#2014</a> caused all resource types to be selected by default.<br /> The behaviour has been reverted back to the previous one where only datasets and series were selected when opening the interface for the first time.<br /> In addition, when the user deselects all resource types, a message is displayed explaining that when no resource type is selected all results are shown.</p>    </content>  </entry>  <entry>   <title>Bug #2014: Discovery: download service datasets among results even when only layers are selected</title>   <id>http://vap-sdisvn.jrc.it/redmine/issues/show/2014</id>   <updated>2013-07-09T18:47:45+02:00</updated>   <content type="html"> <p>A bug has been fixed that caused download service datasets to be included in search results even when only layers were selected.<br /> In addition the frustrating warning 'At least one option must be selected' has been removed.<br /> Now, if no specific resource type is selected, all resource types are included in the results.<br /> If one or more resource type is selected, then the search is restricted to the selected types.</p>    </content>  </entry>  <entry>   <title>Feature #1997: Discovery: Multi-keyword search</title>   <id>http://vap-sdisvn.jrc.it/redmine/issues/show/1997</id>   <updated>2013-06-18T14:35:22+02:00</updated>   <content type="html"> <p>It is now easier to do a multi-keyword search as selected keywords are displayed just below the search box and each keyword can be removed clicking on the 'x' link on its left.</p>    </content>  </entry>  <entry>   <title>Feature #1989: Discovery: Cross-language queries</title>   <id>http://vap-sdisvn.jrc.it/redmine/issues/show/1989</id>   <updated>2013-06-03T16:46:46+02:00</updated>   <content type="html"> <p>The searching capabilities of the Discovery client have been enhanced through the introduction of automatic cross-language queries based on translations taken from the GEMET Thesaurus.<br /> The user can start typing a term in any EU language and a list of matching terms present in the available metadata documents will be shown.<br /> For example, documents containing the word "groundwater" can also be found typing any of the following translations: Подпочвени води, voda podzemní, Grundwasser, υπόγειο νερό, agua subterránea, põhjavesi, pohjavesi, eaux souterraines, talajvíz, acqua sotterranea, gruntinis vanduo, gruntsūdens,riżervi tal-ilma taħt l-art, grondwater, woda gruntowa, águas intersticiais, ape subterane, podzemná voda, podtalnica, podzemne vode, screamhuisce</p>    </content>  </entry>  <entry>   <id>http://inspire-geoportal.ec.europa.eu/discovery/changes.xml#1568</id>   <title>Spinner and error detection when loading layers or base map</title>   <updated>2012-08-14T00:00:01+02:00</updated>   <content type="html"><p>The basemap is now featuring a spinner, which is shown while a layer or the base map is loading.</p><p>Also, an alert message is displayed when an error occurs in loading a layer or the base map.</p></content>   <author>    <name>European Commission, Joint Research Centre</name>    <email>inspire-geoportal@jrc.ec.europa.eu</email>    <uri>http://ec.europa.eu/dgs/jrc/</uri>   </author>  </entry>  <entry>   <id>http://inspire-geoportal.ec.europa.eu/discovery/changes.xml#1567</id>   <title>Geoportal updated with OpenLayers 2.12</title>   <updated>2012-08-14T00:00:02+02:00</updated>   <content type="html"><p>The INSPIRE Geoportal is now using the latest version of the OpenLayers library (v2.12).</p><p>With this version a number of new features have been introduced - e.g., tile offline storage, better accessibility support (mobile), CSS-based tile animation.</p></content>   <author>    <name>European Commission, Joint Research Centre</name>    <email>inspire-geoportal@jrc.ec.europa.eu</email>    <uri>http://ec.europa.eu/dgs/jrc/</uri>   </author>  </entry>  <entry>   <id>http://inspire-geoportal.ec.europa.eu/discovery/changes.xml#1556</id>   <title>Reversed sorting of active layers (last loaded layer first)</title>   <updated>2012-07-30T00:00:00+02:00</updated>   <content type="html"><p>Active layers are now sorted keeping on top the last loaded layer.</p></content>   <author>    <name>European Commission, Joint Research Centre</name>    <email>inspire-geoportal@jrc.ec.europa.eu</email>    <uri>http://ec.europa.eu/dgs/jrc/</uri>   </author>  </entry>  <entry>   <id>http://inspire-geoportal.ec.europa.eu/discovery/changes.xml#1555</id>   <title>Autocomplete bug fix </title>   <updated>2012-07-30T00:00:01+02:00</updated>   <content type="html"><p>Fixed bug which returned an inconsistent number of hits while typing search terms.</p></content>   <author>    <name>European Commission, Joint Research Centre</name>    <email>inspire-geoportal@jrc.ec.europa.eu</email>    <uri>http://ec.europa.eu/dgs/jrc/</uri>   </author>  </entry>  <entry>   <id>http://inspire-geoportal.ec.europa.eu/discovery/changes.xml#1519</id>   <title>Improvements to the ranking of search results</title>   <updated>2012-07-19T00:00:00+02:00</updated>   <content type="html"><p>The criteria used to rank the search results have been modified in order to take into account completeness of information provided. In particular, the highest rank score is given to those providing an effective description of the resource, specifying their spatial coverage, and which are viewable.</p><p>Moreover, by default, only datasets and series are now returned in the result list (these settings can be modified by selecting the options displayed under the "Search" box).</p></content>   <author>    <name>European Commission, Joint Research Centre</name>    <email>inspire-geoportal@jrc.ec.europa.eu</email>    <uri>http://ec.europa.eu/dgs/jrc/</uri>   </author>  </entry>  <entry>   <id>http://inspire-geoportal.ec.europa.eu/discovery/changes.xml#1489</id>   <title>New search filters available</title>   <updated>2012-07-19T00:00:01+02:00</updated>   <content type="html"><ul><li>New search filters available (origin, topic category, service type).</li><li>Users can now select the search filters to be displayed in the sidebar, and the choice is recorded for the whole browser session.</li><li>The filter concerning resource types has been moved in a separate widget; users can now decide exactly which types of resources are to be returned in the search results (default is datasets and series).</li></ul></content>   <author>    <name>European Commission, Joint Research Centre</name>    <email>inspire-geoportal@jrc.ec.europa.eu</email>    <uri>http://ec.europa.eu/dgs/jrc/</uri>   </author>  </entry>  <entry>   <title>Share metadata on Twitter</title>   <id>http://inspire-geoportal.ec.europa.eu/discovery/changes.xml#1524</id>   <updated>2012-06-21T00:00:00+02:00</updated>   <content type="html"><p>A Twitter button has been added to each individual metadata result page as to share a peculiar metadata description with the Twitter community.</p></content>   <author>    <name>European Commission, Joint Research Centre</name>    <email>inspire-geoportal@jrc.ec.europa.eu</email>    <uri>http://ec.europa.eu/dgs/jrc/</uri>   </author>  </entry>  <entry>   <title>Graphical preview of resources</title>   <id>http://inspire-geoportal.ec.europa.eu/discovery/changes.xml#1522</id>   <updated>2012-05-11T00:00:00+02:00</updated>   <content type="html"><p>Clickable thumbnails are now included in the page displaying resource metadata. They are generated from WMS 1.3.0 services (support of 1.1.1 under development). This feature is provided as is and should be further improved.</p><p>When clicked, the full image is shown in a popup window.</p></content>   <author>    <name>European Commission, Joint Research Centre</name>    <email>inspire-geoportal@jrc.ec.europa.eu</email>    <uri>http://ec.europa.eu/dgs/jrc/</uri>   </author>  </entry>  <entry>   <title>Updated base map and added higher zoom level</title>   <id>http://inspire-geoportal.ec.europa.eu/discovery/changes.xml#1432</id>   <updated>2012-02-13T17:22:58+01:00</updated>   <content type="html"><p>The discovery service now uses a new, more detailed base map, which can be zoomed up to a scale of 1:250,000.</p></content>   <author>    <name>European Commission, Joint Research Centre</name>    <email>inspire-geoportal@jrc.ec.europa.eu</email>    <uri>http://ec.europa.eu/dgs/jrc/</uri>   </author>  </entry>  <entry>   <id>http://inspire-geoportal.ec.europa.eu/discovery/changes.xml#1431</id>   <title>Added sort options for search results</title>   <updated>2011-11-16T00:00:00+01:00</updated>   <content type="html"><p>A dropdown has been added to the interface, thanks to which it is possible to sort results, either in ascending or descending order, base on the following information:</p>  <ul>  <li>relevance</li>   <li>resource title</li>   <li>member state</li>   <li>date of creation</li>   <li>date of last revision</li>   <li>resource type</li>   <li>spatial data service type</li>  </ul></content>   <author>    <name>European Commission, Joint Research Centre</name>    <email>inspire-geoportal@jrc.ec.europa.eu</email>    <uri>http://ec.europa.eu/dgs/jrc/</uri>   </author>  </entry>  <entry>   <id>http://inspire-geoportal.ec.europa.eu/discovery/changes.xml#1430</id>   <title>Added country flag to search results to denote their provenance</title>   <updated>2011-11-16T00:00:01+01:00</updated>   <content type="html"><p>Each search result now carries an icon depicting the flag of the EU Member State releasing the corresponding resource.</p></content>   <author>    <name>European Commission, Joint Research Centre</name>    <email>inspire-geoportal@jrc.ec.europa.eu</email>    <uri>http://ec.europa.eu/dgs/jrc/</uri>   </author>  </entry> </feed>
